text1.text: We work together to build a detailed scope of work to help us select talent.
You provide more information about the role, scope of work, talent requirements and company tech stack.
Africave zooms into a bucket of extremely well-calibrated talent and finds candidates fit for role .
Onboarding, with the first two weeks as a zero-risk probation period. If you do not like the talent quality, you do not pay for this time.
